mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Patrick Henry to County Lieutenant of Berkeley, 1777 July 28
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Henry, Patrick, 1736-1799
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patrick Henry writes to the unidentified 'County Lieutenant of Berkely [Berkeley].' He writes "You are hereby directed to furnish General Hand with the numbers of men he may call from your militia to defend the frontier or challenge the Indians." Autograph letter signed, partial loss to signature, 1 page, with integral address panel.
